abstract: The community rallied around Kanku-Dai Zanshin Dojo, donating space and equipment, before it reopened at its new location in Brooklyn.

headline.main: After a Fire, Jump-Starting a Bushwick Dojo
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Dojo Recovers From a Body Blow

snippet: The community rallied around Kanku-Dai Zanshin Dojo, donating space and equipment, before it reopened at its new location in Brooklyn.
